title: Rest Client does not automatically register a Provider for sending application/x-www-form-urlencoded Media Type
body:
### Describe the bug

When creating a REST Client for sending application/x-www-form-urlencoded Media Type to an upstream, no providers are automatically registered.

They are automatically registered only if an annotation `@Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_FORM_URLENCODED)` is also present in some endpoint, in other words, if the project also serve requests, which is not always the case.

### Expected behavior

A Form Provider for the client should be automatically registered or such information should be present in the project's documentation regarding REST Clients development.

### Actual behavior

### How to Reproduce?

Reproducer:

1. Clone the project: [https://github.com/fernandobalieiro/quarkus-rest-client-form-bug](https://github.com/fernandobalieiro/quarkus-rest-client-form-bug)
2. Run `./mvnw clean quarkus:dev -pl rest-server` to start the server in port 8081
3. Run `./mvnw clean quarkus:dev -pl rest-client` to start the client in port 8082
4. Run `curl -v http://localhost:8082/request/remote`
5. The request fails and an Exception is thrown by the REST Client.
